Articles.Content:
So I relentlessly redesign and tweak my spaceplane designs, in an effort to reach optimized flight. Anyways, Heres a series of craft files that have been DECOMMISIONED due to disuse.

https://kerbalx.com/hangars/38133

SPECIAL NOTE! NOT ALL THESE CRAFT ARE INTENDED TO BE USED WITH BOOSTER ROCKETS FOR SPACE TRAVEL! SOME ARE NOT DESIGNED TO BE DESIGNED FOR SSTO FLIGHT! SORRY FOR THE INCONSISTENCY!

https://imgur.com/a/xOJqdA8

 

These are random and not REALLY a series, but close enough ;}
My OCD is killing me that on the mk1 and mk2 the solar panels are not lined up.
